adjective.description: Of a nail, screw, or bolt: having a rounded end or top.
Generally. Having a round, curved, or circular end or top.
Architecture. Of an arch, window, etc.: having a semicircular top.
Of a tree or other plant: having a rounded form or crown, or a rounded flower or seed head.
Of an animal: having a rounded head.
Physical Anthropology. Designating a race or type of man characterized by a skull of rounded shape.
Of a person: having short, closely cropped hair; specifically (British historical) that is a Roundhead. Now rare.

origin: Mid 16th century. From round + headed. In specific use in sense 4 after roundhead.
